required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CopeSmart: Using Mobile Technology to Promote Positive Mental Health in Young People
clinical_study.official_title: CopeSmart: Using Mobile Technology to Promote Positive Mental Health in Young People

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates the effectiveness of a mental health mobile app (CopeSmart) in promoting positive mental health through emotional self-awareness in adolescents. Participants will be recruited from second-level schools in Ireland. Schools will be randomly assigned to the intervention or control condition. Participants in the intervention condition will use CopeSmart for a four week period. Those in the control condition will not use any mental health app.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in levels of emotional self-awareness measured by the Emotional Self-Awareness Scale
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (pre-test), 4 weeks later (post-test) and 8-10 weeks later (follow up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in frequency of use of positive coping strategies measured by the Coping Strategies Inventory
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (pre-test), 4 weeks later (post-test) and 8-10 weeks later (follow up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in levels of well-being measured by the WHO-5 Well-Being Index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (pre-test), 4 weeks later (post-test) and 8-10 weeks later (follow up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in help-seeking behaviour measured by the General Help-Seeking Questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (pre-test), 4 weeks later (post-test) and 8-10 weeks later (follow up)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in levels of emotional distress measured by the Depression, Anxiety and Stress Scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (pre-test), 4 weeks later (post-test) and 8-10 weeks later (follow up)

intervention.description: Participants will use the CopeSmart app at least once per day for four weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Must be between 14 and 19 years
- Must be enrolled in second-level education
- Must have access to an iPhone, iTouch or Android mobile device
- Must obtain signed parental consent to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- No parental consent
